defmodule Solution do
  @spec largest_perimeter(nums :: [integer]) :: integer
  def largest_perimeter(nums) do
    nums
    |> Enum.sort(:desc)
    |> Enum.reduce_while(-1, fn x, acc ->
      case acc do
        -1 -> {:cont, x}
        _ -> 
          [a, b | _] = Enum.take(acc, 2)
          if a + b > x, do: {:halt, a + b + x}, else: {:cont, [x | acc]}
      end
    end)
  end
end
